snippet: The bombing appeared to be the latest instance of civilians bearing the brunt of clashes between Islamist groups in insurgent-held territory.
abstract: Car bomb explodes in Syria, killing at least 43 people and wounding dozens more; attack is reportedly carried out by Islamic State in Iraq and Syria, radical group aligned with Al Qaeda.
lead_paragraph: The bombing appeared to be the latest instance of civilians bearing the brunt of clashes between Islamist groups in insurgent-held territory.

headline.main: Car Bomb Kills More Than 40 at Syrian Border Crossing
headline.print_headline: Syria: Bomb Kills Dozens Near Turkey

keywords.value: Islamic State of Iraq and Syria
keywords.name: organizations
